explanation: [0-0] A man in a green hoodie stands facing right against a white background with his mouth slightly open in surprise. There is a fish to his right.

[0-2] Then the man in the green hoodie opens his mouth and chews as the fish gradually disappears. The man turns to the right and opens his mouth wide in surprise as a fish falls out of his mouth. His green hoodie transforms into a fluorescent green hoodie.
